member.name: P:PMSoft.FrameWork.Lib.BaseHeadInclude.ScriptFormat
member.summary: Script引入的格式化串，格式为"<script src='{resourceUrl}{0}' type='text/javascript' language='javascript'></script>"，{resourceUrl}表示资源文件的站点地址，{0}表示文件路径
